synopsis.text: Minami is an airheaded high school girl whose greatest delight is eating delicious bread for breakfast every morning. On her first day, she bonds with two classmates, the dignified Yuu and the cheerful baker Fuyumi, over their shared love of bread. They are later joined by Noa, a petite girl who wields bread as a weapon but has a sweet personality. Together, these four friends, united by their passion for baked goods, seek to sample every type of bread there is. As they strengthen their bonds over breakfast, they find that bread brings happiness and reliability into their everyday school life. Whether using bread to make new friends or defend themselves, one thing's for sure - for Minami and her "bread buddies," bread makes their world go round. Follow the airheaded bread lover Minami and her new friends in "Pan de Peace!" - a heartwarming comedy about the joy that simple bread can bring into the lives of four very different high school girls.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
